survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from participants of professional certification programs to evaluate satisfaction levels, program effectiveness, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes an open-text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the certification program?

questions.question_text: How relevant was the course content to your professional needs?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the scale is clear and intuitive.

script.question_text: How relevant was the course content to your professional needs?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the effectiveness of the instructors or facilitators?
questions.client_notes: Include an optional open-text field for additional comments.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with an optional open-text follow-up.

script.question_text: How would you rate the effectiveness of the instructors or facilitators?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the certification program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: What aspects of the certification program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How prepared did you feel for the certification exam after completing the program?
questions.client_notes: Include an optional follow-up question for those who felt unprepared.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with conditional routing for 'Not very prepared' or 'Not prepared at all'.

script.question_text: How prepared did you feel for the certification exam after completing the program?

questions.question_text: What could be improved in the certification program to better meet your needs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What could be improved in the certification program to better meet your needs?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this certification program to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Include an optional open-text field for additional comments.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with optional open-text follow-up.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this certification program to a colleague?

questions.question_text: How did the certification program impact your career advancement or professional growth?
questions.client_notes: Include an optional open-text field for elaboration.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with optional open-text follow-up.

script.question_text: How did the certification program impact your career advancement or professional growth?

questions.question_text: What additional support or resources would have been helpful during the program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement.

script.question_text: What additional support or resources would have been helpful during the program?
